memberdef.name: _FILE_OFFSET_BITS
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* to prevent warnings in the check below */

memberdef.name: FILESIZEBITS
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* to prevent warnings in the check below */

memberdef.name: HTTPPOST_FILENAME
memberdef.initializer: (1<<0) /* specified content is a file name */

memberdef.name: HTTPPOST_READFILE
memberdef.initializer: (1<<1) /* specified content is a file name */

memberdef.name: HTTPPOST_PTRNAME
memberdef.initializer: (1<<2) /* name is only stored pointer do not free in formfree */

memberdef.name: HTTPPOST_PTRCONTENTS
memberdef.initializer: (1<<3) /* contents is only stored pointer do not free in formfree */

memberdef.name: CURL_IPRESOLVE_WHATEVER
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* default, resolves addresses to all IP versions that your system allows */

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* curl_progress_callback)(void *clientp, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ultotal, double ulnow)
memberdef.argsstring: )(void *clientp, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ultotal, double ulnow)
memberdef.name: curl_progress_callback

memberdef.definition: typedef size_t(* curl_write_callback)(char *buffer, size_t size, size_t nitems, void *outstream)
memberdef.name: curl_write_callback

memberdef.definition: typedef size_t(* curl_read_callback)(char *buffer, size_t size, size_t nitems, void *instream)
memberdef.name: curl_read_callback

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* curl_passwd_callback)(void *clientp, const char *prompt, char *buffer, int buflen)
memberdef.name: curl_passwd_callback

memberdef.argsstring: )(CURL *handle, curl_infotype type, char *data, size_t size, void *userptr)
memberdef.name: curl_debug_callback

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* curl_lock_function)(CURL *handle, curl_lock_data data, curl_lock_access locktype, void *userptr)
memberdef.name: curl_lock_function

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* curl_unlock_function)(CURL *handle, curl_lock_data data, void *userptr)
memberdef.name: curl_unlock_function

detaileddescription.para: Globally initializes cURL given a bitwise set of the different features to initialize.
Globally cleanup cURL, uses the value of "init_flags" to determine what needs to be cleaned up and what doesn't
